name: Planar Fissure 300%
description: During the event, successfully challenge Simulated Universe to earn triple rewards via the immersion device.
introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, Trailblazers can receive triple rewards via the immersion device by challenging Simulated Universe.
You will get TWO additional rewards on top of default drops after consuming an event triple reward opportunity and Trailblaze Power (or Immersifier).
During the event, the number of triple reward opportunities is limited and can be viewed on the Planar Fissure 300% event page.
The triple reward count will not reset during the event. Be sure to schedule your time for this challenge accordingly, Trailblazers.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
By challenging Simulated Universe and obtaining rewards via the immersion device, Trailblazers will automatically consume one remaining chance to receive triple rewards.
